DataElement.preferredName: Sequence Alignment Sequence Similarity Pattern java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:The act of adjusting or aligning objects in relation to each other; the result of this activity._The degree of similarity between the primary sequence of two biological macromolecules.:A distinctive style or form of something, the characteristic set of traits or actions or qualities of a group, person, or thing, as behavior patterns; in molecular biology: a nucleic acid or protein motif that is computationally detectable within aligned sequences._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.
